thread.title: Adorable Newfoundland Dog Wants Hug From Daddy
thread.title_full: Adorable Newfoundland Dog Wants Hug From Daddy

author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: Adorable Newfoundland Dog Wants Hug From Daddy
text:
Adorable Newfoundland Dog Wants Hug From Daddy   
Bear hugs with breakfast? Boss the Newfoundland Dog is 190 pounds and loves to cuddle. In this adorable short clip, he asks dad for a hug at breakfast time. 
Click on the image/Instagram video below to watch Boss give a bear hug. 
Boss also likes giving mom hugs too. 
Boss is a member of the Mitchell family, which includes three boys, and Ralphie, a brown Newfie. 
The two big dogs are wonderful babysitters. Check out more pictures of the gentle giants and their family here .
